alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Erie and Crawford Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1029 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Northwest Harborcreek to near Cambridge Springs to Adamsville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Edinboro, North East, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Linesville, Wattsburg, Adamsville, Canadohta Lake, Pymatuning Central, Harmonsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Pymatuning North and Atlantic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
